name: silex
description: Silex is a self-hosted website builder and CMS that runs entirely in the browser. Users can visually design responsive websites with drag-and-drop elements and publish static sites easily.

features.title: Visual Website Builder
features.description: Creates websites with drag-and-drop elements without coding

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Automatically adapts layouts for desktop, tablet, and mobile screens

features.title: Component Library
features.description: Provides pre-built components like headers, galleries, and forms

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Generates clean HTML/CSS/JS files for hosting anywhere

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Starts projects from customizable templates for faster development

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Adds custom styling with CSS editor for advanced customization

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Uploads and manages images with built-in media library

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Configures meta tags, titles, and descriptions for search optimization
